objects.description: [Industroyer](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0001) uses the first COM port from the configuration file for the communication and the other two COM ports are opened to prevent other processes accessing them. This may block processes or operators from getting reporting messages from a device.(Citation: ESET Win32/Industroyer Jun 2017)

external_references.description: Anton Cherepanov, ESET. (2017, June 12). Win32/Industroyer: A new threat for industrial control systems. Retrieved September 15, 2017.
